entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
